allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add patient nationality field, notifications system, and subscription analytics

This commit includes several enhancements to the Dental CMS:

Patient Management:
- Add nationality field with searchable Select2 dropdown
- Make email, address, city, and postal_code optional fields
- Remove postal_code requirement from patient forms

Notifications System:
- Create notifications table and controller
- Add unread notification counter to header
- Implement notification center with mark as read functionality
- Add notification routes and views

Super Admin Features:
- Add subscription analytics page
- Update navigation with subscription analytics link
- Consolidate Reports and Analytics in sidebar

UI/UX Improvements:
- Streamline sidebar navigation menu
- Update profile settings in navigation
- Enhance notification display in header dropdown

)")
